Name Rascal/Libraries/Graph/bottom

Function set[&T] bottom(Graph[&T] G)
Description Returns the bottom nodes of Graph G, i.e., the leaf nodes that don't have any descendants.
Examples 
rascal>import Graph;
ok
rascal>bottom({<1,2>, <1,3>, <2,4>, <3,4>});
set[int]: {4}
